dcterms:creator: C. Favorita
dcterms:description: The dataset encompasses around 200,000 daily sales time series for over 4,000 products across 54 stores, spanning the years 2013 to 2018. It is used to construct a test problem involving real time series data from a large retailer, where the optimum is poorly understood.
dcterms:title: Corporación Favorita Grocery Sales Forecasting Dataset

dcterms:description: The historical demand data is used for training and is derived from the dataset mentioned in the context of the Corporación Favorita Grocery Sales Forecasting competition.
dcterms:title: Historical Demand Data

dcterms:creator: P. Zipkin
dcterms:description: This dataset is used to analyze inventory control problems and is referenced for its methods related to lost-sales inventory systems.
dcterms:title: Zipkin's Inventory Control Problems

dcterms:creator: A. Oroojlooyjadid
M. Nazari
L. V. Snyder
M. Takáč
dcterms:description: This dataset is derived from the Beer Game and is used to evaluate deep reinforcement learning methods for inventory optimization.
dcterms:title: Demand Traces from the Beer Game

dcterms:description: Synthetic demand traces generated based on mathematical generative models, such as from a Poisson distribution.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Demand Traces
